translations: adj.合法的，法律许可的；法定的

sentences.sentence: The detention of the fugitive was lawful.
sentences.translation: 对逃亡者的拘留是合法的。

sentences.sentence: Lawful job search sites offer levels of privacy protection.
sentences.translation: 合法的求职网站会在不同程度上保护隐私。

sentences.sentence: However, he will not go until he receives the lawful signal.
sentences.translation: 然而，在收到合法的信号之前，他是不会走的。
